item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, November 2, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Starmer vows tough reforms and seeks to calm markets
2. Israeli secret services make arrests after leak probe in Netanyahu’s office
3. Trump says Liz Cheney is ‘war hawk’ who should face ‘guns trained on her’
4. US says ‘Russian influence actors’ are behind viral election video hoax
5. [Opinion] We will be living in Trumpland for decades
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, November 2, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
